q: were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. It felt like we were watching a miracle, Debbie Wasserman Schultz told reporters traveling back to Washington with her on Air Force One. "The strength that you could see flowing out of her, it was like she was trying to will her eyes open."

quarterback and they have your ascending to the throne of all of football, but your high school experience-- tell me about your high school experience and then where did that take you?" Aaron Rodgers : Yeah, I was not really recruited out of high school, ended up playing baseball my senior year and thought about doing baseball, thought about joining the military but I decided to go the junior college route, which not a lot of kids go to who actually have good grades. Um, I had pretty good grades in high school.( Audience laughs) But that was a great opportunity to advance my career." David Letterman : "Now why weren't you recruited out of high school for a college, a major college?"

Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gave a "key to the city" to Michael Vick . The action spawned outrage from many North Texans( including our Mayor Tom Leppert releasing the following statement on Monday afternoon: The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval. Given these circumstances I have requested the City Manager propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future.
